data.title: Welcome to The Daily Neopets!
data.meta_description: The Daily Neopets is a fan site where you will find more than 1,000 pages of game guides, articles, avatar solutions, plot help, and more.
data.text:
Welcome! The Daily Neopets is a Neopets fan site that is devoted to providing you with the best Neopets help, articles, tips, and more. We pride ourselves on our large selection of content: Neopets cheats, dailies, in-depth plot solutions, game guides, articles, unreleased news, and more!

More Sections: TDN Graphics, Items Database, Neopets Avatar Solutions, Avatar Lending Program

New Premium Goodie Bag! August 7 at 10:52 pm NST by Musical_Shoyru • 0 comments

TNT just dropped, into your inventories that is, a brand new goodie bag! All Neopets Premium Subscribers should expect to see the 25th Anniversary Premium Goodie Bag soon!

Check Out the Prize Pool Here!

Neopets Down For Maintenance TODAY! August 7 at 8:52 pm NST by hrtbrk • 0 comments

Neopets is expected to go down for roughly 30 minutes at around 4pm NST today for server maintenance. Please expect downtime during this period.

Neopets Themed TTRPG & a New Avie! August 7 at 9:07 am NST by Musical_Shoyru • 11 comments

The company Geekify launched a kickstarter to help fund their new Neopets Tabletop Roleplaying Game. In a mere 6 hours the project had already reached their goal! Users that pledge even just a $1 will receive a Rare Item Code for a new exclusive avatar when the product officially releases. You can view the kickstarter here!

The kickstart officially closes on August 11, 2024 @10:09 AM NST.

Make sure to pledge $1 and not donate if you are going for the avie.

Neopets Comments On Recent Server Attack August 2 at 6:54 pm NST by hrtbrk • 7 comments

Neopets has made a statement explaining the recent sporadic downtime plaguing the site - it was a DDOS attack. They have taken the appropriate measures to try and mitigate the situation.

Per TNT Luna,

Quote

Hi everyone,

We wanted to let you know that a couple of days ago, our servers were targeted by a distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack. In response, we implemented several temporary solutions to mitigate the impact. Unfortunately, this may have caused some of you to experience issues accessing the site, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Our team has been working tirelessly to resolve the issue, and the website should be up and running properly now.

We are continuously monitoring the situation to ensure everything runs smoothly, and we will provide further updates when we can.

Thank you so much for your patience, understanding, and for bringing these issues to our attention. We appreciate your support!

Thank you!

August AMA Code; Expires in 48 Hours! August 2 at 3:11 am NST by Musical_Shoyru • 3 comments

Head to the Grundos Warehouse to enter the code YOOYUAUGUST for this months prize - a Green Yooyu!

NOTE: This code is only active for the next 48 hours so act fast!

For more information about August's Altador Cup Edition AMA, you can watch it on their official youtube page featured here.

Premium Scratch Cards Receive Prize Update! August 1 at 9:06 pm NST by hrtbrk • 3 comments

Premium Space Faerie Scratch Cards have received a new update today, introducing some brand new and rare prizes to the pool.
